name: Craftz.io
description:
Craftz.io, a crafting game Consists of various wastes to make a very powerful weapon. fight on the ground fight in the sky Win wars to collect resources. WAR IN MULTIPLAYER MODE Crafting resources can be obtained by opening boxes. Players can collect bolts to get items, guns, armor, wheels, engines, missiles, energy and skills. Craftz.io is a real-time multiplayer battle game.

You can suggest ideas in the comments.
